sentences.en: Attendconferences and give seminars at schools to publicize your work andyourself.
sentences.cn: 在学校里参加会议,并发起讨论会,推广你的工作和你自己.

sentences.en: Chindonya are performers who use drums , instruments and dance to publicize businesses.
sentences.cn: 使用大鼓 、 乐器及舞蹈的东西屋乐队,是个为广告商表演的乐团.

sentences.en: I take this as an excellent opportunity to publicize our corporation.
sentences.cn: 伯恩:我认为这是一次提高我们公司知名度的好机会.

sentences.en: Publicize the experience of this co - operative wherever you go.
sentences.cn: 你就到处大讲这个社的经验.

sentences.en: Silkworm mulberry was built to publicize leadership group on the village.
sentences.cn: 村上建立了蚕桑宣传领导小组.

sentences.en: television’s failure to publicize the unemployment issue
sentences.cn: 电视未能报道失业问题

sentences.en: The author appeared on television to publicize her latest book.
sentences.cn: 那位作家上电视宣传她的新书。

sentences.en: The campaign is intended to publicize the service of the tourist board.
sentences.cn: 这次宣传运动目的在于为旅游部门的服务做广告.

sentences.en: They flew to Europe to publicize the plight of the refugees.
sentences.cn: 他们飞往欧洲报道难民的惨状。

sentences.en: To give special attention to ; display , publicize, or make prominent.
sentences.cn: 飞机制造商公开展示了一种新型的喷气发动机.

sentences.en: To publicize and promote the concept of Osteopathy the general public.
sentences.cn: 向市民宣传和推广“颅脊学”的概念.

sentences.en: We are trying to publicize our products by advertisement on buses.
sentences.cn: 我们正试图在公共汽车上做广告来宣传我们的产品.

sentences.en: We must publicize the meeting widely.
sentences.cn: 我们必须广泛地宣扬这次会议.

sentences.en: We should publicize the census well.
sentences.cn: 我们要做好这次人口普查的宣传工作.
